verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness
bow before him, Love and adore him
worship the lord in the beauty of holiness

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come before Him and bless his name
Give unto the Lord, all ye people
give unto the Lord the glory due his name
Give unto the Lord, all ye people
Bring an offering, and bless His name
